__e: I did, and you refused My help.

All that was fine until it came time to pay his bill.

"When my feet refused to go on"

And he assumed that you wouldn't mind sleeping with him, too, but you said no.

Maybe rejection, certainly because of what your father did to you.
And he assumed that you wouldn't mind sleeping with him, too, but you said no.
